languages.text: "Я..." {n}Чувства Кассии пронзают сердце раскаленной иглой, заполняя его печалью. И тут же отступают, когда Леди-Навигатор, опомнившись, сжимает ладони и вспарывает тонкую кожу когтями.{/n} "В таком случае, я лишь желаю вам... счастья, Лорд-капитан. Пусть мне самой и не суждено стать для вас его частью".

"I..." {n}Cassia's feelings pierce your heart like a white-hot needle, filling it with sadness. But they quickly retreat as she catches herself and clenches her fists, cutting the skin on her palms with her claws.{/n} "In that case, I wish you... only the best, Lord Captain. Even if I am not meant to be part of all that is good in your life."
languages.original_text: "Я..." {n}Чувства Кассии пронзают сердце раскаленной иглой, заполняя его печалью. И тут же отступают, когда Леди-Навигатор, опомнившись, сжимает ладони и вспарывает тонкую кожу когтями.{/n} "В таком случае, я лишь желаю вам... счастья, Лорд-капитан. Пусть мне самой и не суждено стать для вас его частью".

languages.text: 「あたくしは…」{n}カシアの感情があなたの心臓を熱い針のように刺し、悲しみで満たす。だが彼女が自身の手のひらを爪で傷つけるほど強く手を握って自制する間に、悲しみはすぐ引いていった。{/n}「それでしたら、あたくしは{name}様の幸運を…祈るのみです、ロード・キャプテン。たとえあたくしが{name}様の人生に起こる幸福の一部になる運命ではなかったとしても」
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia's feelings pierce your heart like a white-hot needle, filling it with sadness. But they quickly retreat as she catches herself and clenches her fists, cutting the skin on her palms with her claws.{/n} "In that case, I wish you... only the best, Lord Captain. Even if I am not meant to be part of all that is good in your life."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしは…」{n}カシアの感情があなたの心臓を熱い針のように刺し、悲しみで満たす。だが彼女が自身の手のひらを爪で傷つけるほど強く手を握って自制する間に、悲しみはすぐ引いていった。{/n}「それでしたら、あたくしは{name}様の幸運を…祈るのみです、ロード・キャプテン。たとえあたくしが{name}様の人生に起こる幸福の一部になる運命ではなかったとしても」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我……”{n}卡西娅的感情仿佛白热的针刺穿了你的心，令你悲伤不已。不过，她的感情很快就消退了，因为她拼命克制着自己的情绪，握紧了拳头，尖锐的爪子刺破了手掌的皮肤。{/n}“既然如此，我希望你……永远都能得到最美好的感情，舰长大人……即便这意味着，我无法成为你生命中最美好的一部分。”
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia's feelings pierce your heart like a white-hot needle, filling it with sadness. But they quickly retreat as she catches herself and clenches her fists, cutting the skin on her palms with her claws.{/n} "In that case, I wish you... only the best, Lord Captain. Even if I am not meant to be part of all that is good in your life."

traits.locale_text: “我……”{n}卡西娅的感情仿佛白热的针刺穿了你的心，令你悲伤不已。不过，她的感情很快就消退了，因为她拼命克制着自己的情绪，握紧了拳头，尖锐的爪子刺破了手掌的皮肤。{/n}“既然如此，我希望你……永远都能得到最美好的感情，舰长大人……即便这意味着，我无法成为你生命中最美好的一部分。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je... » {n}Les sentiments de Cassia vous transpercent le cœur telle une aiguille chauffée à blanc et l'emplissent de tristesse. Mais ils refluent rapidement alors qu'elle se ressaisit et serre les poings, enfonçant au passage ses griffes dans la chair tendre de ses paumes.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je vous souhaite... tout le bonheur du monde, Votre Seigneurie. Même si je ne suis pas appelée à faire partie de ce qui vous rend la vie plus douce. »
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia's feelings pierce your heart like a white-hot needle, filling it with sadness. But they quickly retreat as she catches herself and clenches her fists, cutting the skin on her palms with her claws.{/n} "In that case, I wish you... only the best, Lord Captain. Even if I am not meant to be part of all that is good in your life."

traits.locale_text: « Je... » {n}Les sentiments de Cassia vous transpercent le cœur telle une aiguille chauffée à blanc et l'emplissent de tristesse. Mais ils refluent rapidement alors qu'elle se ressaisit et serre les poings, enfonçant au passage ses griffes dans la chair tendre de ses paumes.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je vous souhaite... tout le bonheur du monde, Votre Seigneurie. Même si je ne suis pas appelée à faire partie de ce qui vous rend la vie plus douce. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Yo...». {n}Los sentimientos de Cassia atraviesan tu corazón como una aguja al rojo vivo y lo llenan de tristeza, pero pronto retroceden cuando Cassia se detiene y aprieta los puños, cortando la piel de sus manos con sus garras.{/n} «En ese caso, le deseo... solo lo mejor, Lord Capitán. Aunque eso no me incluya a mí».
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia's feelings pierce your heart like a white-hot needle, filling it with sadness. But they quickly retreat as she catches herself and clenches her fists, cutting the skin on her palms with her claws.{/n} "In that case, I wish you... only the best, Lord Captain. Even if I am not meant to be part of all that is good in your life."

Aunque eso no me incluya a mí».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ..." {n}Cassias Gefühle durchbohren dein Herz wie eine glühend heiße Nadel und erfüllen es mit Traurigkeit. Aber schon bald fasst sie sich wieder, ballt die Fäuste und schneidet mit ihren Klauen in die Haut ihrer Handteller.{/n} "In dem Fall wünsche ich Euch ... nur das Beste, Lord Captain. Auch wenn ich kein Teil von dem sein soll, was in Eurem Leben gut ist."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia's feelings pierce your heart like a white-hot needle, filling it with sadness. But they quickly retreat as she catches herself and clenches her fists, cutting the skin on her palms with her claws.{/n} "In that case, I wish you... only the best, Lord Captain. Even if I am not meant to be part of all that is good in your life."

Aber schon bald fasst sie sich wieder, ballt die Fäuste und schneidet mit ihren Klauen in die Haut ihrer Handteller.{/n} "In dem Fall wünsche ich Euch ... nur das Beste, Lord Captain. Auch wenn ich kein Teil von dem sein soll, was in Eurem Leben gut ist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ben..." {n}Cassia'nın duyguları, akkor bir iğne misali yüreğini delerek kederle dolduruyor. Ancak hata yaptığını fark etmesi ve yumruğunu sıkarak pençeleriyle avucundaki deriyi kesmesiyle birlikte kendini hemen toparlıyor.{/n} "O hâlde sana... En iyi dileklerimi sunarım Lord Kaptan. Hayatındaki tüm güzel şeylerin bir parçası olmak, kaderimde yazmasa da..."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia's feelings pierce your heart like a white-hot needle, filling it with sadness. But they quickly retreat as she catches herself and clenches her fists, cutting the skin on her palms with her claws.{/n} "In that case, I wish you... only the best, Lord Captain. Even if I am not meant to be part of all that is good in your life."
